items.title: Santa Catalina Park
items.description: A lively park in the city center, perfect for morning walks and observing urban life.

items.title: Santa Ana Cathedral
items.description: The main cathedral of the city, showcasing impressive architecture, located in the historic Vegueta district.

items.title: Vegueta Market
items.description: A traditional market offering fresh produce and local delicacies, open in the mornings.

items.title: Doramas Park
items.description: A green oasis with fountains and tropical plants, ideal for relaxation.

items.title: Plaza de España
items.description: A popular meeting spot with cafes and shops, perfect for a morning coffee.

items.title: Las Canteras Beach
items.description: A beautiful urban beach with golden sand, protected by a natural reef that creates calm swimming conditions.

items.title: Alfredo Kraus Auditorium
items.description: A modern concert hall with ocean views, hosting various daytime events and exhibitions.

items.title: Las Arenas Shopping Center
items.description: A large shopping mall near the beach, offering a variety of shops and dining options.

items.title: Elder Museum of Science and Technology
items.description: An interactive museum suitable for all ages, located in Santa Catalina Park.

items.title: Romano Park
items.description: A spacious park with jogging tracks and picnic areas, popular among locals.

items.title: Triana District
items.description: A bustling commercial area with numerous shops, restaurants, and bars, ideal for evening strolls.

items.title: Bandama Caldera
items.description: A large volcanic crater offering panoramic views, perfect for watching the sunset.

items.title: La Isleta Neighborhood
items.description: A district with narrow streets and traditional houses, home to authentic restaurants and bars.

items.title: Santa Ana Square
items.description: A historic square in front of the cathedral, surrounded by old buildings and cafes.

items.title: Columbus House
items.description: A museum dedicated to Christopher Columbus's voyages, situated in a beautiful colonial building.

items.title: The Paper Club
items.description: A popular nightclub in the city center with live music and DJ sets. Great for those who love a mix of dance and alternative beats.

items.title: La Azotea de Benito
items.description: A stylish rooftop bar with panoramic city views, serving some of the best cocktails in town. A great place for a relaxed but chic night out.

items.title: Fortuni Nightclub
items.description: An upscale club with an elegant interior, modern music, and an exclusive atmosphere. Ideal for those looking for a high-end nightlife experience.

items.title: The Mansion
items.description: A lively bar with a mix of great drinks, live music, and a vibrant crowd. A fantastic place to hang out late into the night.

items.title: Boogie Nightclub
items.description: A dynamic and energetic nightclub with a modern design and a mix of electronic and commercial music. Popular among both locals and tourists.
